name: Karl Jump: Remake
description:
is a game inspired by Flappy Bird.

What is Flappy Bird you ask? It's a game in which you control a bird, but there's a catch.. this bird is flying home and there's obstacles... more precisely, pipes! You've gotta go through them in order to make the best score you can.

Originally, it was only Karl Jump but I lost the game's files and got enough motivation to make it again... from scratch. So I hope you have fun!

Just like the first version of the game, I will change the game's assets at some point.

There will also be new gamemodes in the future!

Download's below, have fun!
